Package org.academics.dal

Class dbStudent

java.lang.Object
org.academics.dal.dbStudent
public class dbStudent extends Object
A database access class for managing student actions.

  • Method Details

    • computeGPA

      public static double computeGPA(String studentID) throws SQLException
      Computes the grade point average (GPA) for a given student using a stored procedure in the database.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student whose GPA is to be computed
      Returns:
      the computed GPA value, rounded to two decimal places
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while interacting with the database

    • fetchGrades

      public static ResultSet fetchGrades(String studentID, String tillSem) throws SQLException
      Fetches the grades of a given student for all courses taken until a given semester, using a prepared statement.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student whose grades are to be fetched
      tillSem - the semester until which the grades are to be fetched
      Returns:
      a ResultSet object containing the fetched grades
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while interacting with the database

    • fetchCourses

      public static ResultSet fetchCourses(String studentID, String semester) throws SQLException
      Returns a ResultSet object that contains the course codes, course names, and grades for the courses that a particular student has enrolled in up to the current semester.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student whose enrolled courses are to be fetched
      semester - the current semester
      Returns:
      a ResultSet object that contains the course codes, course names, and grades for the courses that the student has enrolled in
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query

    • dropCourse

      public static int dropCourse(String studentID, String course_code, String semester) throws SQLException
      Drops a course from a student's schedule for the current semester.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student whose schedule should be updated
      course_code - the code of the course to be dropped
      semester - the semester in which the course is being dropped
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the update (should be 1 if the drop was successful)
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while interacting with the database

    • fetchCoursesForRegistration

      public static ResultSet fetchCoursesForRegistration(String semester) throws SQLException
      This method retrieves the list of available courses for a given semester
      Parameters:
      semester - The semester for which the available courses are to be fetched
      Returns:
      A ResultSet object containing the available courses for the given semester
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL statement

    • fetchMinCGPA

      public static double fetchMinCGPA(String course_code, String semester) throws SQLException
      This method fetches the minimum CGPA required to qualify for a particular course in a given semester
      Parameters:
      course_code - The course code of the course
      semester - The semester in which the course is being offered
      Returns:
      The minimum CGPA required to qualify for the course
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error while executing the SQL query

    • getCoursePrerequisite

      public static ResultSet getCoursePrerequisite(String course_code, String semester) throws SQLException
      Returns the prerequisites for a given course in a given semester.
      Parameters:
      course_code - the code of the course for which prerequisites are to be retrieved
      semester - the semester for which the prerequisites are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a ResultSet object containing the prerequisites of the given course in the given semester
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error while accessing the database

    • enrollCourse

      public static boolean enrollCourse(String studentID, String course_code, String semester)
      Enrolls a student in a course for a given semester after performing credit limit and already enrolled checks.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student to enroll
      course_code - the code of the course to enroll in
      semester - the semester to enroll in
      Returns:
      true if the student was enrolled successfully, false otherwise

    • checkEnrollmentAvailability

      public static boolean checkEnrollmentAvailability(String course_code, String semester) throws SQLException
      Checks if a given course is being offered in the given semester.
      Parameters:
      course_code - the code for the course being checked
      semester - the semester in which the course is being checked for availability
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating whether the course is being offered in the given semester
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query

    • checkPreRequisitesEligibility

      public static boolean checkPreRequisitesEligibility(String[] prerequisites, String studentID) throws SQLException
      This method checks the eligibility of a student for the given prerequisites by verifying the grades of the required courses. It returns a boolean value indicating whether the student meets the prerequisites or not.
      Parameters:
      prerequisites - An array of prerequisites required for a course
      studentID - The ID of the student whose eligibility is being checked
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating whether the student meets the prerequisites or not
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error while querying the database
